title: SHAMS Plant Economics & Cost Authority 2.0 (v383.0.0)
intent: Deterministic CAPEX/OPEX/LCOE-lite proxy with availability tiering derived from governance outputs. Diagnostic-only; does not change plasma truth.
notes: This contract is a governance overlay. It is algebraic and non-iterative by design.
Availability tiering is intentionally conservative: any flagged control/disruption tightness degrades the tier.
All coefficient defaults are chosen for transparency and can be overridden via the existing economics coefficient mechanism.

validity_domain.comment: Governance proxy validity is limited; use for screening only.
